title: BlockGPT_BSC
author: BlockGPT_BSC
content: The governance token on the BlockGPT platform! It’s a cryptocurrency that will be freely traded by users on PancakeSwap, used for #BlockGPT community management and voting.With $BGPT, holding ratios determine different levels of permission granted to users. This enables users to have a say in decisions made on our platform, with major upgrades and decisions requiring a vote with $BGPT.The smart contract of $BGPT has been fully audited.Contract Address:0xe6f12e0fb5366fe34a06845eafcac4667f210a4ePresale date: 5.16, 2 p.m. UTC.Whether you’re a developer, investor, or just interested in #blockchain technology, $BGPT has something for you. Get ready to experience the power of $BGPT!

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: FahriZah on May 15, 2023, 04:52:17 PMFirst of all thank you so much for shearing with us this types of good opportunities because GPT project i hope creating hype very soon and your suggesting project very smart and good one GPT projects we are very excited about that opportunities.This project has zero to do with Generative Pre-trained Transformer. It's just a generic BEP-20 scam token, and it doesn't even have fair distribution but some lame IDO without homepage or a whitepaper. If you are for real, stay away. Even though i am sensing that this is your second account trying to hype your own nonsensical scams.Quote from: AiAnubis on May 20, 2023, 03:25:05 PMFirst get rid of the Clowns that scream Scam.Make Certik Audit and then List on CEXPlease don't list this scam anywhere.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: always wondered these coin with name GPT does it really live up to its name or its just random coin.where is the GPT based AI that they have, what it really do, does it have similarity with openAI's GPT? otherwise it's silly using GPT name while not really implementing the GPT based AI.
